events.message: Applicant has submitted a personal loan request to cover medical expenses that have recently arisen.
The loan application was categorised as a personal loan due to the nature of the applicant's medical-related funding needs.
A loan officer was assigned to handle the personal loan application, ensuring dedicated follow-up on medical expense details.
The initial review of the personal loan application was conducted, focusing on applicant’s income and stated medical costs.
Additional documents were requested to verify medical bills and proof of income to support the personal loan request.
The applicant submitted all requested documentation, including medical invoices and recent pay stubs, to proceed with evaluation.
A credit check was completed, revealing a good credit score, indicating the applicant’s creditworthiness for the personal loan.
Risk assessment was performed considering the applicant’s medical debt and repayment capacity, showing moderate risk.
An offer was presented to the applicant with competitive interest rates and flexible terms tailored for personal medical financing.
Applicant responded positively to the offer, appreciating the low rates and the clear repayment schedule proposed.
The application was escalated for final approval due to the loan amount slightly exceeding initial limits for personal loans.
Final approval was granted successfully after reviewing all documents and risk factors related to the medical personal loan.
Funds were disbursed into the applicant's bank account to cover urgent medical treatment and associated expenses.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant is satisfied with the loan services and managing repayments comfortably.
The personal loan application file was closed successfully, marking the end of the application process after funding.
